item.title: A small issue, with a big annoyance :)
item.dc:creator: @matzie matzie
item.description:
@matzie wrote:

i do have the code for it, though there are 26^3 possible colors. and i can only look at 2216 at a time =\ but i can compile a list, even if it takes forever T_T the code is way ugly but it works so IDC =]

i found

bla
blu
cya
dbl
dre
gre
lre
mag
red
whi
xxx <-- i think that one might be relativley unknown O_o'
yel

i went through the 17k possibilities from aaa-ygc (some reason my computer didn’t finish the list)

@ran@

item.source: A small issue, with a big annoyance :)

item.title: A small issue, with a big annoyance :)
item.dc:creator: @codyskate5021 codyskate5021
item.description:
@codyskate5021 wrote:

[quote=“CoreVersion, post:1, topic:418950”]Right, basically, my client or source, not sure which one i am supposed to talk about, but, i think my source takes colour codes from @xxx@,

For example
@red@
@cya@
@blu@.

However, my question to anyone who can answer it, is… Is there a full list of colour codes light those above, that i can use to make my server seem more ‘pretty’?

Thanks alot, can’t seem to find those codes anywhere, only hex, and i thought they are something to do with 0xffffff or something along those lines.

Also, or how ever that one works, won’t register on my server either, so its only the @xxx@ ones that will work

Thankyou in advance,
CoreVersion.[/quote]

@blu@ @cya@ @red@ @gre@ @yel@ @pur@ just think of a color and use the first 3/4 letters. thats what i did for mine…

Read full topic

However, my question to anyone who can answer it, is… Is there a full list of colour codes light those above, that i can use to make my server seem more ‘pretty’?
